Name: Average resolution time for cases involving 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' before reaching 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Difference in average time between 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' compared to 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING'

Name: Average time from 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' to the next 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total time spent in 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by MISSING and the end of the case

Name: Average time between 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' and 'Request Payment'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Minimum time observed from 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' to 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' in cases where re-submission occurs
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total resolution time of cases with 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' before final approval
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average waiting time before 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' after 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING'

Name: Time from 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' to 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' in the fastest case
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Difference in total time for cases with 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' versus cases without this activity before 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time it takes from 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' to 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' in cases where this path is followed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Longest time from 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' to 'Payment Handled' across all variants
Metric: The maximum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Shortest time from 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' to 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' in cases of re-submission
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
